00079 RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::LauncherOptions(FXApp * a)
00080    :FXDialogBox(a,"RainbruRPG options editor", DECOR_TITLE|DECOR_CLOSE|DECOR_BORDER|DECOR_SHRINKABLE|DECOR_STRETCHABLE|DECOR_MENU, 100, 100, 
00081                 800, 600, 10, 10, 10, 10, 4, 4){
00082  
00083 
00084   switchPanelId=0;
00085 
00086   // frame construction
00087   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_Y|
00088                                               LAYOUT_FIX_HEIGHT);
00089   root->setHeight(580);
00090 
00091   FXHorizontalFrame *frame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00092 
00093   FXShutter* tab=new FXShutter( frame, NULL, 0, FRAME_SUNKEN|LAYOUT_FILL_Y|
00094                                 LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH, 0, 0, 100);
00095 
00096   tab->setWidth(150);
00097 
00098   swi=new FXSwitcher(frame);
00099 
00100 
00101   // Constructs panels
00102   tOptionPanelList* panelList=OptionManager::getSingleton().getPanelList();
00103   tOptionPanelList::const_iterator iter;
00104 
00105   for (iter=panelList->begin(); iter != panelList->end(); iter++)  {
00106     addOptionPanel( tab, swi, (*iter) );
00107   }
00108 
00109 
00110   // Buttons
00111   FXHorizontalFrame *frBtn = new FXHorizontalFrame(root, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_BOTTOM);
00112   frBtn->setPadLeft(40);
00113   frBtn->setPadRight(40);
00114 
00115   FXButton* btnCancel=new FXButton(frBtn, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00116                           ID_BTN_CANCEL, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00117 
00118   FXButton* btnOK=new FXButton(frBtn, "OK", NULL, this, ID_BTN_OK, 
00119                                BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_RIGHT|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00120 
00121   btnCancel->setWidth(120);
00122   btnOK->setWidth(120);
00123 
00124   // Status line
00125   FXStatusLine* stas=new FXStatusLine (root, NULL);
00126   stas->setLayoutHints(LAYOUT_FIX_HEIGHT|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00127   stas->setHeight(20);
00128 
00129   //  snapshot panel
00130   FXGroupBox* snapGroup=new ::FXGroupBox(root, "Snapshots",GROUPBOX_NORMAL| FX::FRAME_SUNKEN|LAYOUT_FILL_X );
00131 
00132   FXHorizontalFrame *frSnap = new FXHorizontalFrame(snapGroup, LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_BOTTOM);
00133 
00134   btnSaveSnap=new FXButton(frSnap, "Save", NULL, this, 
00135                           ID_SAVE_SNAP, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00136   btnSaveSnap->setWidth(120);
00137   btnSaveSnap->disable();
00138 
00139   FXButton* btnNewSnap=new FXButton(frSnap, "New", NULL, this, 
00140                           ID_NEW_SNAP, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00141   btnNewSnap->setWidth(120);
00142 
00143   FXButton* btnDelSnap=new FXButton(frSnap, "Delete", NULL, this, 
00144                           ID_DEL_SNAP, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00145   btnDelSnap->setWidth(120);
00146 
00147   FXButton* btnCopySnap=new FXButton(frSnap, "Copy", NULL, this, 
00148                           ID_CPY_SNAP, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH);
00149   btnCopySnap->setWidth(120);
00150 
00151 
00152   // Snapdhot combobox
00153   createSnapCombo(frSnap);
00154 }

00202 FX::FXIcon* RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::loadIcon(const char* filename){
00203 
00204   LOGCATS("Loading icon ");
00205   LOGCATS(filename);
00206   LOGCAT();
00207 
00208   std::string s=USER_INSTALL_PREFIX;
00209   s+="/share/RainbruRPG/data/fox/";
00210   s+=filename;
00211 
00212   FXIcon *ico=new FXICOIcon(getApp());
00213 
00214   if(ico){
00215     FXFileStream stream;
00216     if(stream.open(s.c_str(),FXStreamLoad)){
00217       ico->loadPixels(stream);
00218       stream.close();
00219       ico->create();
00220     }
00221   }
00222 
00223   return ico;
00224 }

00271 FXShutterItem* RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00272 addOptionPanel(FXShutter *tab,FXSwitcher* com, OptionPanel* op){
00273 
00274   FXShutterItem *item= new FXShutterItem(tab, op->getCaption());
00275 
00276   tOptionButtonList * btnList=op->getButtonList();
00277 
00278   tOptionButtonList::const_iterator iter;
00279 
00280   for (iter=btnList->begin(); iter != btnList->end(); iter++)  {
00281     addOptionButton( item, com, (*iter) );
00282   }
00283 
00284   return item;
00285 }

00301 FXComposite* RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00302 addOptionButton(FXShutterItem* it, FXSwitcher* com,
00303                              OptionButton* btn){
00304 
00305   FXuint opts=BUTTON_TOOLBAR|TEXT_BELOW_ICON|FRAME_THICK|FRAME_RAISED|
00306               LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_TOP|LAYOUT_LEFT;
00307 
00308   FXButton *b=new FXButton(it->getContent(), btn->getCaption(), 
00309                             loadIcon( btn->getIconFilename()), this, 
00310                            ID_BTN_OPTION, opts);
00311 
00312   b->setBackColor(it->getBackColor());
00313   b->setTextColor(FXRGB(255, 255, 255));
00314 
00315   // The new layout (A panel caption and the attributeOptions
00316   FXVerticalFrame *panelCaption = new FXVerticalFrame(com, LAYOUT_FIX_HEIGHT);
00317   panelCaption->setHeight(50);
00318 
00319   FXLabel* label=new FXLabel(panelCaption,  btn->getCaption(), 
00320                              NULL,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00321 
00322   label->setJustify( FX::JUSTIFY_CENTER_X );
00323   FXFont *fnt2=new FXFont( getApp(), "helvetica", 25);
00324   label->setFont(fnt2);
00325 
00326 
00327   FXMatrix* frMatrix=new FXMatrix(panelCaption, 2, 
00328                    LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH|MATRIX_BY_COLUMNS|LAYOUT_BOTTOM, 0, 0, 0, 
00329                                   0, DEFAULT_SPACING, DEFAULT_SPACING, 
00330                                   DEFAULT_SPACING,DEFAULT_SPACING,  
00331                                   DEFAULT_SPACING, 5);
00332 
00333   frMatrix->setWidth(600);
00334 
00335   btn->setFoxPanelId(switchPanelId++);
00336 
00337 
00338   // Adds the optionAttribute
00339   addOptionAttribute(frMatrix, btn);
00340 
00341   return frMatrix;
00342 
00343 }

00354 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00355 onOptionButtonClick(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00356   LOGI("You have clicked on an optionButton :");
00357   FXButton* b=(FXButton*)o;
00358 
00359   // Get the panel name
00360   FXWindow* win=b->getParent()->getParent()->getParent();
00361   FXShutterItem* si=(FXShutterItem*)win;
00362   FXString panelCaption=si->getButton()->getText();
00363 
00364   // Get the button name
00365   FXString buttonCaption=b->getText();
00366 
00367   OptionButton* btn=OptionManager::getSingleton().
00368     getButtonByName(panelCaption.text(), buttonCaption.text());
00369 
00370   if (!btn){
00371     LOGW("Cannot get the OptionButton :");
00372     LOGCATS(" Panel name :");
00373     LOGCATS(panelCaption.text());
00374     LOGCAT();
00375     LOGCATS(" Button name :");
00376     LOGCATS(buttonCaption.text());
00377     LOGCAT();
00378 
00379   }
00380   else{
00381     int sw=btn->getFoxPanelId();
00382     swi->setCurrent(sw);
00383   }
00384 
00385   return 1;
00386 }

00395 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00396 addOptionAttribute(FXComposite* parent, OptionButton* button){
00397 
00398   tOptionAttributeList* lst=button->getAttributeList();
00399   tOptionAttributeList::const_iterator iter;
00400 
00401   for (iter=lst->begin(); iter != lst->end(); iter++)  {
00402 
00403     tOptionAttributeType type=(*iter)->getType();
00404 
00405     switch(type){
00406     case OAT_UNKNOWN:
00407       LOGW("Trying to create a OAT_UNKNOWN");
00408       break;
00409     case OAT_INTEGER:
00410       drawInteger( parent, (*iter) );
00411       break;
00412     case OAT_STRING :
00413       drawString( parent, (*iter) );
00414       break;
00415     case OAT_BOOLEAN:
00416       drawBoolean( parent, (*iter) );
00417       break;
00418     case OAT_FLOAT:
00419       LOGI("OAT_FLOAT Not Yet implemented");
00420       break;
00421     case OAT_FLOAT_RANGE:
00422       LOGI("OAT_FLOAT_RANGE Not Yet implemented");
00423       break;
00424     case OAT_INT_RANGE:
00425       LOGI("OAT_INT_RANGE Not Yet implemented");
00426       break;
00427     case OAT_LIST :
00428       drawList( parent, (*iter) );
00429       break;
00430     }
00431   }
00432 }

00440 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::drawInteger(FXComposite* parent, 
00441                                                    OptionAttribute* attrb){
00442 
00443   FXLabel* lab=new FXLabel(parent, attrb->getName());
00444   FXSpinner *spin=new FXSpinner (parent, 4, this, ID_ATTRB_WIDGET);
00445   spin->setUserData(attrb);
00446 
00447   attrb->setWidget(spin);
00448 
00449   lab->setHelpText(attrb->getToolTip());
00450   spin->setHelpText(attrb->getToolTip());
00451 }

00490

00499 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::drawList(FXComposite*parent, 
00500                                                 OptionAttribute*attrb){
00501 
00502   OptionListAttribute* vList=(OptionListAttribute*)attrb;
00503 
00504   new FXLabel(parent, attrb->getName());
00505 
00506   FXComboBox *cb=new FXComboBox( parent, 31, this, ID_ATTRB_WIDGET, 
00507     COMBOBOX_STATIC||LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH|LAYOUT_RIGHT,
00508                                         0, 0, 200 );
00509 
00510   cb->setUserData(attrb);
00511 
00512   cb->setNumVisible(vList->valueCount());
00513 
00514   attrb->setWidget(cb);
00515 
00516 
00517   // feed combo box
00518   tValueList* values=vList->getValueList();
00519   tValueList::const_iterator iter;
00520 
00521   for (iter=values->begin(); iter != values->end(); iter++)  {
00522     cb->appendItem((*iter));
00523   }
00524 }

00526 
00539 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00540 onAttributeChange(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00541   LOGI("onAttributeChange called");
00542 
00543   // (const char*)v represente la valeur
00544   OptionManager::getSingleton().setDamage(true);
00545   btnSaveSnap->enable();
00546 
00547 
00548   FX::FXId* id=(FX::FXId*)o;
00549   if (id){
00550     OptionAttribute* attrb=(OptionAttribute*)id->getUserData();
00551     if (attrb){
00552 
00553       // We must test if the sender is a checkbutton
00554       // It is a special case
00555       if (strcmp("FXCheckButton", id->getClassName())==0){
00556         // We have a check button
00557         bool b=(bool)v;
00558         attrb->setValueStr(StringConv::getSingleton().btoc(b));
00559       }
00560       else if (strcmp("FXSpinner", id->getClassName())==0){
00561         int i=(int)v;
00562         attrb->setValueStr(StringConv::getSingleton().itoc(i));
00563       }
00564       else{
00565         attrb->setValueStr((const char*)v);
00566       }
00567 
00568       LOGCATS("Received OptionAttribute value : ");
00569       LOGCATS(attrb->getValueStr());
00570       LOGCAT();
00571     }
00572     else{
00573       LOGW("Cannot get a valid OptionAttribute");
00574     }
00575   } 
00576 
00577   return 1;
00578 }
00579 
00588 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::update(){
00589   OptionManager::getSingleton().update();
00590 }

00592 
00602 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00603 onNewSnapshot(FXObject *o, FXSelector s, void* v){
00604 
00605   LOGI("New snapshot");
00606 
00607   if (OptionManager::getSingleton().isDamage()){
00608     LOGI("Snapshot damaged");
00609     int i=FXMessageBox::question (getApp(), FX::MBOX_YES_NO, 
00610                                   "Snapshot unsaved", 
00611                                   "The current snapshot was modified.\n"
00612                                   "Do you want to save it ?\n\n"
00613                                   "If you choose No, all the changes you\n"
00614                                   "made will be lost.");
00615 
00616   }
00617   FXString newName;
00618   bool str=FXInputDialog::getString (newName, this, "New snapshot", 
00619                             "Give a unique name for this new snapshot");
00620 
00621   if (str){
00622     if (newName.empty()){
00623       FXMessageBox::error(this, FX::MBOX_OK, "The snapshot cannot be created",
00624                           "You can not create a new snapshot with an "
00625                           "empty name.\n The snapshot is not created");
00626     }
00627     else{
00628       
00629 
00630       // Test if the new snapshot name is in use
00631       xmlOptions opts;
00632       if (opts.isSnapShotExists(newName.text())){
00633         FXMessageBox::error(this, FX::MBOX_OK, 
00634                             "The snapshot cannot be created",
00635                             "The name you entered is already used.\n "
00636                             "Please try another snapshot name.");
00637 
00638       }
00639       else{
00640         cbSnap->appendItem(newName);
00641         
00642         OptionManager::getSingleton().setAttributesDefaultValues();
00643         OptionManager::getSingleton().update();
00644         OptionManager::getSingleton().saveCurrentSnapshot(newName.text());
00645         refreshSnapCombo();
00646         selectSnapshot(newName.text());
00647       }
00648     }
00649   }
00650 
00651   return 1;
00652 }
00653 
00663 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00664 onSaveSnapshot(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00665 
00666   OptionManager::getSingleton().saveCurrentSnapshot(cbSnap->getText().text());
00667   btnSaveSnap->disable();
00668 
00669   return 1;
00670 }

00677 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::createSnapCombo(FXComposite* parent){
00678   // The snapshots comboBox
00679   cbSnap=new FXComboBox( parent, 31, this, ID_CHANGE_SNAP, 
00680     COMBOBOX_STATIC||LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH|LAYOUT_RIGHT,
00681                                         0, 0, 200 );
00682 
00683   refreshSnapCombo();
00684 
00685 }

00692 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::selectSnapshot(const char* c){
00693   FXint it= cbSnap->findItem(c);
00694   cbSnap->setCurrentItem(it);
00695 }

00706 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00707 onChangeSnapshot(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00708   LOGI("Snapshot selected");
00709 
00710   OptionManager::getSingleton().loadSnapshot(cbSnap->getText().text());
00711 
00712   return 1;

00724 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00725 onDeleteSnapshot(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00726   int i=FXMessageBox::question (getApp(), FX::MBOX_YES_NO, 
00727                                 "Delete snapshot", 
00728                                 "Do you really want to definitively "
00729                                 "remove the current snapshot ?");
00730   
00731   
00732   if (i==MBOX_CLICKED_YES){
00733     OptionManager::getSingleton().deleteSnapshot(cbSnap->getText().text());
00734     refreshSnapCombo();
00735 
00736     OptionManager::getSingleton().loadSnapshot(cbSnap->getText().text());
00737 
00738     update();
00739   }
00740   else{
00741     LOGI("Delete snapshot cancelled");
00742   }
00743 
00744   return 1;
00745 }
00746 
00752 void RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::refreshSnapCombo(){
00753   cbSnap->clearItems();
00754 
00755   // get the snapshot list
00756   tSnapshotList::const_iterator iter;
00757   xmlOptions xmlo;
00758   tSnapshotList* snapList=xmlo.getSnapshotList();
00759 
00760 
00761   // setting the number of visible elements
00762   int i=snapList->size();
00763   if (i>5) i=5;
00764   cbSnap->setNumVisible(i);
00765 
00766   // populate the combo box
00767   if (snapList){
00768     for (iter=snapList->begin(); iter != snapList->end(); iter++){
00769       cbSnap->appendItem((*iter));
00770     }
00771   }
00772   else{
00773     LOGW("Can not get a valid snapshot list");
00774   }
00775 }
00776 
00786 long RainbruRPG::Gui::LauncherOptions::
00787 onCopySnapshot(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00788   FXString newName;
00789   bool str=FXInputDialog::getString (newName, this, "Copy snapshot", 
00790                             "Give a unique name for the new snapshot");
00791 
00792   if (str){
00793     if (newName.empty()){
00794       FXMessageBox::error(this, FX::MBOX_OK, "The snapshot cannot be created",
00795                           "You can not create a new snapshot with an "
00796                           "empty name.\n The snapshot is not created");
00797     }
00798     else{
00799       
00800 
00801       // Test if the new snapshot name is in use
00802       xmlOptions opts;
00803       if (opts.isSnapShotExists(newName.text())){
00804         FXMessageBox::error(this, FX::MBOX_OK, 
00805                             "The snapshot cannot be created",
00806                             "The name you entered is already used.\n "
00807                             "Please try another snapshot name.");
00808 
00809       }
00810       else{
00811         cbSnap->appendItem(newName);
00812         OptionManager::getSingleton().saveCurrentSnapshot(newName.text());
00813         refreshSnapCombo();
00814         selectSnapshot(newName.text());
00815       }
00816     }
00817   }
00818 
00819   return 1;
00820 }
